alert.note: Alert for Eastern Clinton; Eastern Essex; Northern Franklin; Northern St. Lawrence; Southeastern St. Lawrence; Southern Franklin; Southwestern St. Lawrence; Western Clinton; Western Essex (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 04 at 12:04PM EST until January 05 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 10 AM EST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Freezing rain and sleet expected. Ice accumulations of a 0.05 to 0.40 inches expected. Locally higher ice totals approaching half an inch are possible near Massena, New York. Winds gusting 20 to 30 mph. * WHERE...Portions of northern New York. * WHEN...From 3 PM this afternoon to 10 AM EST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Power outages and tree damage are likely due to the ice. Travel could be nearly impossible. The hazardous conditions could impact the Wednesday evening and Thursday morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Northeast wind gusts over Massena, New York could approach 35 mph. In combination with freezing rain, this may produce more ice accumulation on elevated surfaces, tree limbs, and utility lines.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Please allow extra time if travel is necessary.
